property.name: pageKey
property.description: A unique key for a CMS page.

property.name: name
property.description: The name of an entity (e.g., user, category, product, role).

property.name: validTo
property.description: The date and time until which an entity is valid.

property.name: isSearchable
property.description: A flag indicating if a product or page is searchable.

property.name: uuid
property.description: A Universally Unique Identifier for an entity.

property.name: uuid
property.description: A Universally Unique Identifier for an entity.

property.name: name
property.description: The name of an entity (e.g., user, category, product, role).

property.name: detail
property.description: A detailed error message providing more specific information about an issue.

property.name: entityId
property.description: The unique identifier of an entity.

property.name: entityType
property.description: The type of a data entity (e.g., 'product', 'category').

property.name: localeName
property.description: The name of a locale, such as "en_US" or "de_DE".

property.name: localeUrls
property.description: A collection of URLs, keyed by locale.
